title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); runs in Docker, supports RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, PDF-chat, Docker-compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image source and compose examples for CPU & GPU setups.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling support.

title: ollama-chatbot (streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chatbot UI that talks to Ollama via REST; supports markdown, code blocks, session memory.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with async client, streaming, and embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent wrapper around Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module with decorators and dependency-injection support for Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed requests and streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated list of custom Modelfiles (CodeLlama, WizardMath, Zephyr, etc.) ready to import.
